manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, photorealistic camel behind the two men, making sure the scale matches the background.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the rightmost man's crutch and add a faint motion blur to his leg suggesting movement.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background wall with a snow-covered mountain range, matching lighting.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rainfall to the scene, adding water streaks on the wall and wet patches on the ground.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a faint, ghostly reflection of the two men onto the wet ground, respecting the lighting angle.
